titles.title: Federal Contracts Debarment Act of 1993
A bill to amend the National Labor Relations Act to require Federal contracts debarment for persons who violate labor relations provisions, and for other purposes.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S13278-13279)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Labor and Human Resources.

committee.name: Committee on Labor and Human Resources

bill.summary: 10/7/1993--Introduced. Federal Contracts Debarment Act of 1993 - Amends the National Labor Relations Act to make ineligible for all Federal contracts for a period of three years any person or entity that, with a clear pattern and practice, violates such Act. Allows removal of such debarment or reduction of such period under certain conditions.
